column2: Desire to Make Active Suicide Attempt

column17: 0 = Would take precautions to save life
column18: 1 = Would leave life/death to chance (e.g., carelessly crossing a busy street)
column19: 2 = Would avoid steps necessary to save or maintain life (e.g., diabetic ceasing to take insulin)

column2: Control Over Suicidal Action/Acting Out Wish
Deterrents to Active Attempt (e.g., family, religion; possibility of serious injury if unsuccessful; irreversibility)
column17: 0 = Would not attempt suicide because of a deterrent
column19: 2 = Minimal or no concern about deterrents

column2: Deterrents to Active Attempt (e.g., family, religion; possibility of serious injury if unsuccessful; irreversibility)  Indicate deterrents, if any:

column17: 0 = To manipulate the environment; get attention revenge

column18: 1 = Considered, but details not worked out
1 = Method would take time/effort; opportunity not readily available
column20: 2b = Future opportunity or availability of method anticipated

column2: Sense of "Capability" to Carry Out Attempt
column17: 0 = No courage, too weak, afraid, incompetent

column19: 2 = Complete (e.g., had pills, razor, loaded gun)

column18: 1 = Started but not completed; only thought about

column2: Final Acts in Anticipation of Death (e.g., insurance, will, gifts)
column18: 1 = Thought about or made some arrangements
column19: 2 = Made definite plans or completed arrangements

column2: Intent to Die Associated with Last Attempt
